variables.description: The default ink color to use for a shifting bottom navigation.

usedBy.description: Creates the styles for a tab in the bottom navigation.

context.name: react-md-bottom-navigations-nav

usedBy.description:
Styles a bottom navigation that is colored to update the `.md-background--primary` color to a new color. It also will
optionally update the label's color and the ink's color if they do not equal the defaults. This is mostly used when
you want to update the navigation drawer's color when a new tab is clicked.

variables.description:
The transition time it takes for the bottom navigation to slide out of view when
it is dynamic. It is also the transition time for switching the background color.

usedBy.description: Creates the styles for bottom navigations.

context.name: react-md-bottom-navigations

mixins.description: Creates the styles for bottom navigations.

context.name: react-md-bottom-navigations

usedBy.description:
Includes every component, transition, and typography including their
media queries if the `$md-media-included` variable is `true`. You can
modify any global variables before including this mixin to change the overall
theme.

context.name: react-md-everything

mixins.description: Creates the styles for a tab in the bottom navigation.

context.name: react-md-bottom-navigations-nav

usedBy.description: Creates the styles for bottom navigations.

context.name: react-md-bottom-navigations

mixins.description:
Styles a bottom navigation that is colored to update the `.md-background--primary` color to a new color. It also will
optionally update the label's color and the ink's color if they do not equal the defaults. This is mostly used when
you want to update the navigation drawer's color when a new tab is clicked.

example.code: this.setState({ themeTabActive: activeTabIndex === 1 })} />

parameter.name: bg-color
parameter.description: The background color to force for the `.md-background--primary` of the bottom navigation.

parameter.name: label-color
parameter.description:
The color to style the label. If this is equal to `$md-white-base`, the styles
    will not be created.

parameter.name: ink-color
parameter.description:
The ink color to use for this theme. If it equals the
    `$md-bottom-navigation-shifting-ink-color`, the styles will not be included.
